mapper.select: SELECT cno, name, price, poster, num FROM (SELECT cno, name, price, poster, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT cno, name, price, poster FROM ${table_name} ORDER BY cno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
